attributes.action: Remove pensions from failed Ministers in the same way proposed for failed bankers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The shameful failure of a number of major banks has resulted in a call by many parties (including a number of Ministers) that the banks' former leaders' unjustifiably large pensions should be removed.

Where the decisions of Ministers result in failures of a similar magnitude or impact on the nation, its citizens or the economy, then their pensions should be similarly removed.
